## lnet icmp

Runs an ICMP scan on your local device

### Synopsis

ref: rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc792

```
lnet icmp [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for icmp
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.lnet.yaml)
```
